summary: The implementation fully addresses all requirements from the BuildRequest. All five core requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-5) have been implemented with comprehensive components covering the landing page, features display, mobile access section, compliance/security information, and professional design theme. All required images are properly referenced in the components.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer component includes social media links (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) with icons and navigation sections
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify footer content, social media integration, or multi-section footer navigation

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor setup with Internet Identity authentication system including login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states as non-goal: 'No employee authentication and data management systems'. Authentication infrastructure was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Category badges on feature cards (Core, Payments, Integration, Benefits, Analytics, Security)
hallucinated_features.reason: Feature categorization and badge system was not specified in requirements, which only requested clear descriptions and logical groupings

hallucinated_features.description: Certification badges for SOC 2, GDPR, PCI DSS, and ISO 27001 compliance in ComplianceSection
hallucinated_features.reason: Specific compliance certifications were not mentioned in REQ-4, which only requested general compliance and security information

hallucinated_features.description: Download Mobile App button and native app features (iOS/Android apps with offline support)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint states 'informational/marketing website showcase' with no functional systems. Native mobile apps are not part of the scope
